info.name: JobsServer
info.description: This is the postman collection for the Jobs Server API.

item.name: Authentication

request.description:
This API is used for login.

Credentials for login are as follows:

**Recruiter with jobs:  
Email**: [squareboat@gmail.com](mailto:squareboat@gmail.com)  
**Password**: squareboat

**Recruiter without any jobs:  
Email**: [sb@gmail.com](mailto:sb@gmail.com)  
**Password**: squareboat

On successful login, in response, a token will be present whose value will be used in Authentication header.

item.description: This folder contains the APIs required for authentication.

item.name: Recruiters

request.description:
This API is used to fetch jobs of authenticated recruiter.  
  
To fetch jobs of next page, a query parameter "page" with value as the page number.  
**Eg.** To fetch jobs of page 2, hit the url:  
[https://jobs-api.squareboat.info/api/v1/recruiters/jobs?page=2](https://jobs-api.squareboat.info/api/v1/recruiters/jobs?page=2)

**NOTE:** Authentication token (received in login response) should be passed in Authentication header.

request.description:
This API is used to fetch candidates of a particular job.  
URL: recruiters/jobs/{job_id}/candidates  
Change the job id to get applicants of that job.

An authentication token of the recruiter needs to be passed in the Authentication header.

If no candidates are present, API will give response code of 200. If job id is invalid or does not belong to authenticated user, response code of 404 will be received.

response.name: Success
No candidates applied

item.description: This folder contains the APIs required for recruiter flow.
